# tv-text-max-lines

**Article**

Specifies the maximum number of lines of text in an element.

## Overview

Here’s an example that shows a text element with a maximum of three lines of text.

```xml
<text style="tv-text-max-lines:3">Maximum of 3 lines</text>
```
